description: Jacketed 10mm Auto ammunition with a 180gr bullet.  The 10mm Auto cartridge is a rather powerful handgun round and the progenitor to the more popular .40 S&W.

Jacketed 10mm Auto ammunition with a 180gr bullet.  The 10mm Auto cartridge is a rather powerful handgun round and the progenitor to the more popular .40 S&W.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

Jacketed 10mm Auto ammunition with a 180gr bullet.  The 10mm Auto cartridge is a rather powerful handgun round and the progenitor to the more popular .40 S&W.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
